text: <@UN6NFJUL8> have you simply tried {% if blog_comments %}  content {% endif %} as a wrapper?

hi there! I am trying to display popular posts on my blog listing template. `blog_popular_posts()` is working great for me so far. I was curious, however, if there was a way to build it out so that I can add a time range of when the blog was posted. Im thinking it would work like the `blog_related_posts` tag with a `start_date` and `end_date` range. does anyone have any ideas?
